mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_name AS "contractName", a.contract_code AS "contractCode", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_contract a
AND a.contract_code LIKE '%'||#{contractCode}||'%' '%'+#{contractCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{contractCode}, '%')
AND a.contract_name LIKE '%'||#{contractName}||'%' '%'+#{contractName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{contractName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO archive_contract( contract_name, contract_code, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{contractName}, #{contractCode}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE archive_contract SET contract_name = #{contractName}, contract_code = #{contractCode}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
